tool_description: Get Hadiths from all noble and genuine collections, including Sahih al-Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, Sunan an-Nasa'i, Jami' at-Tirmidhi, Sunan Ibn Majah, and Sunan Abi Dawud, along with their complete details.
name: Hadith
title: Hadith

api_list.name: Returns a random Hadith.
api_list.description: Returns a random Hadith on each call with its complete details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadith2.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadith2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://hadith2.p.rapidapi.com/random"

headers = {

api_list.name: Returns a single Hadith.
api_list.description: Returns a single Hadith from a particular collection, book, and Hadith number with it's complete details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadith2.p.rapidapi.com/bukhari/3/17"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadith2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hadith2.p.rapidapi.com/{collectionname}/{booknumber}/{hadithnumber}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadith2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Returns all the books of a collection.
api_list.description: Returns all the books of a particular collection.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hadith2.p.rapidapi.com/collection/bukhari/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hadith2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
